> From: Mike Clark [mailto:mike@...] 
>
> Along the same lines, I have had occasion to use the same single test 
> method technique with an externalize data file, but allowing for 
> multiple failures to be accumulated.  While looping through 
> the "rows" 
> of data, the test method catches AssertionFailedError and 
> adds it to a 
> collection of failures.  When the test suite completes, it dumps out 
> any failures that were collected along the way.
> 

Yes, and some times the pattern that arises from allowing one or more
errors to express themselves in multiple failures provides a strong clue
for finding the origin of the defect.

-----------------------------
Mike Silverstein
SilverMark, Inc.

www.javatesting.com
